label: Voucher
comment: A printed piece of paper or an electronic document that can be used instead of money to pay for an experience, such as a tour, a trip or a meal in a restaurant.

objectProperties.comment: The indication of whether or not this experience item voucher is applicable.
A textual description of this experience item voucher.
A monetary value shown on the face of this experience item voucher.
The identifier for this experience item voucher.
The date or date time of the issuance of this experience item voucher.
A name, expressed as text, of the company issuing this experience item voucher.
The code specifying the type of experience item voucher.

referencedBy.comment: An experience item voucher identified for this trade settlement payment means.
